mn142:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
mn142:2.1: Atha kho mahapajapati gotami navam dussayugam adaya yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinna kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn142:2.2: “idam me, bhante, navam dussayugam bhagavantam uddissa samam kantam samam vayitam.
mn142:2.3: Tam me, bhante, bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn142:2.4: Evam vutte, bhagava mahapajapatim gotamim etadavoca:
mn142:2.6: Sanghe te dinne ahanceva pujito bhavissami sangho ca”ti.
mn142:2.7: Dutiyampi kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn142:2.8: “idam me, bhante, navam dussayugam bhagavantam uddissa samam kantam samam vayitam.
mn142:2.9: Tam me, bhante, bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn142:2.10: Dutiyampi kho bhagava mahapajapatim gotamim etadavoca:
mn142:2.12: Sanghe te dinne ahanceva pujito bhavissami sangho ca”ti.
mn142:2.13: Tatiyampi kho mahapajapati gotami bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn142:2.14: “idam me, bhante, navam dussayugam bhagavantam uddissa samam kantam samam vayitam.
mn142:2.15: Tam me, bhante, bhagava patigganhatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn142:2.16: Tatiyampi kho bhagava mahapajapatim gotamim etadavoca:
mn142:2.18: Sanghe te dinne ahanceva pujito bhavissami sangho ca”ti.
mn142:3.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn142:3.2: “patigganhatu, bhante, bhagava mahapajapatiya gotamiya navam dussayugam.
mn142:3.3: Bahupakara, bhante, mahapajapati gotami bhagavato matuccha apadika posika khirassa dayika;
mn142:3.6: Bhagavantam, bhante, agamma mahapajapati gotami buddham saranam gata, dhammam saranam gata, sangham saranam gata.
mn142:3.7: Bhagavantam, bhante, agamma mahapajapati gotami panatipata pativirata adinnadana pativirata kamesumicchacara pativirata musavada pativirata suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirata.
mn142:3.8: Bhagavantam, bhante, agamma mahapajapati gotami buddhe aveccappasadena samannagata, dhamme aveccappasadena samannagata, sanghe aveccappasadena samannagata ariyakantehi silehi samannagata.
mn142:3.9: Bhagavantam, bhante, agamma mahapajapati gotami dukkhe nikkankha, dukkhasamudaye nikkankha, dukkhanirodhe nikkankha, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nikkankha.
mn142:4.2: Yam hananda, puggalo puggalam agamma buddham saranam gato hoti, dhammam saranam gato hoti, sangham saranam gato hoti, imassananda, puggalassa imina puggalena na suppatikaram vadami, yadidam—
mn142:4.4: Yam hananda, puggalo puggalam agamma panatipata pativirato hoti, adinnadana pativirato hoti, kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, musavada pativirato hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti, imassananda, puggalassa imina puggalena na suppatikaram vadami, yadidam—
mn142:4.6: Yam hananda, puggalo puggalam agamma buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti, dhamme … sanghe … ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti, imassananda, puggalassa imina puggalena na suppatikaram vadami, yadidam—
mn142:4.8: Yam hananda, puggalo puggalam agamma dukkhe nikkankho hoti, dukkhasamudaye nikkankho hoti, dukkhanirodhe nikkankho hoti, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nikkankho hoti, imassananda, puggalassa imina puggalena na suppatikaram vadami, yadidam—
mn142:6.1: Tatrananda, tiracchanagate danam datva sataguna dakkhina patikankhitabba, puthujjanadussile danam datva sahassaguna dakkhina patikankhitabba, puthujjanasilavante danam datva satasahassaguna dakkhina patikankhitabba, bahirake kamesu vitarage danam datva kotisatasahassaguna dakkhina patikankhitabba, sotapattiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanne danam datva asankheyya appameyya dakkhina patikankhitabba, ko pana vado sotapanne, ko pana vado sakadagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanne, ko pana vado sakadagamissa, ko pana vado anagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanne, ko pana vado anagamissa, ko pana vado arahattaphalasacchikiriyaya patipanne, ko pana vado arahante, ko pana vado paccekasambuddhe, ko pana vado tathagate arahante sammasambuddhe.
mn142:7.11: ‘Ettaka me bhikkhu ca bhikkhuniyo ca sanghato uddissatha’ti danam deti—
mn142:7.13: ‘Ettaka me bhikkhu sanghato uddissatha’ti danam deti—
mn142:7.15: ‘Ettaka me bhikkhuniyo sanghato uddissatha’ti danam deti—
mn142:8.1: Bhavissanti kho panananda, anagatamaddhanam gotrabhuno kasavakantha dussila papadhamma.
mn142:8.2: Tesu dussilesu sangham uddissa danam dassanti.
mn142:8.3: Tadapaham, ananda, sanghagatam dakkhinam asankheyyam appameyyam vadami.
mn142:8.4: Na tvevaham, ananda, kenaci pariyayena sanghagataya dakkhinaya patipuggalikam danam mahapphalataram vadami.
mn142:9.1: Catasso kho ima, ananda, dakkhina visuddhiyo.
mn142:9.3: Atthananda, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato.
mn142:9.4: Atthananda, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati no dayakato.
mn142:9.5: Atthananda, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato.
mn142:9.6: Atthananda, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca.
mn142:10.1: Kathancananda, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato?
mn142:10.2: Idhananda, dayako hoti silava kalyanadhammo, patiggahaka honti dussila papadhamma—
mn142:10.3: evam kho, ananda, dakkhina dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato.
mn142:11.1: Kathancananda, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati no dayakato?
mn142:11.2: Idhananda, dayako hoti dussilo papadhammo, patiggahaka honti silavanto kalyanadhamma—
mn142:11.3: evam kho, ananda, dakkhina patiggahakato visujjhati no dayakato.
mn142:12.1: Kathancananda, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato?
mn142:12.2: Idhananda, dayako ca hoti dussilo papadhammo, patiggahaka ca honti dussila papadhamma—
mn142:12.3: evam kho, ananda, dakkhina neva dayakato visujjhati no patiggahakato.
mn142:13.1: Kathancananda, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca?
mn142:13.2: Idhananda, dayako ca hoti silava kalyanadhammo, patiggahaka ca honti silavanto kalyanadhamma—
mn142:13.3: evam kho, ananda, dakkhina dayakato ceva visujjhati patiggahakato ca.
mn142:13.4: Ima kho, ananda, catasso dakkhina visuddhiyo”ti.
mn142:14.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
